pricing.title: Pricing Plans | Onetime Secret
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your secure information sharing needs. From basic free plans to premium options with custom domains and dedicated infrastructure.

errors.passphraseRequired: Passphrase is required when option is selected.

secrets.keepSensitiveInfo: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
secrets.secretPlaceholder-premium: Type your secret message here (stored in {noun})
secrets.regionExplanation: Your secrets stay in your selected region. This helps meet data residency requirements and privacy regulations like GDPR.
secrets.complianceNote: Helps with SOC2, GDPR, CCPA & HIPAA requirements for data privacy
secrets.shareLinkDescription: Share your secret link with others.

useCases.sectionSubtitle: See how professionals use secure links in their daily workflows
useCases.privacyNote: Your secrets are encrypted, never stored in logs, and automatically deleted after viewing.

it.title: IT Professional
it.description: Securely share credentials and access information with your team

benefits.1: Prevent credential leaks in email and chat logs
benefits.3: Enforce security protocols for sensitive information

it.compliance: Helps meet SOC 2 and ISO 27001 security requirements for access control

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: Share API keys and credentials securely during development

benefits.1: Keep API keys and tokens out of code repositories
benefits.2: Securely onboard new team members with access credentials
benefits.3: Share database connection strings without compromising security

developer.compliance: Helps enforce security best practices for CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure access

hr.title: HR Manager
hr.description: Securely share sensitive employee information and credentials

benefits.1: Safely transmit onboarding credentials to new employees
benefits.2: Share confidential information with one-time access
benefits.3: Maintain privacy for sensitive HR communications

hr.compliance: Helps meet GDPR and other privacy regulations for handling personal data

legal.title: Legal Team
legal.description: Share confidential legal documents and information securely

benefits.1: Maintain attorney-client privilege in digital communications
benefits.2: Securely share case-sensitive information with clients
benefits.3: Control access to confidential settlement terms

legal.compliance: Helps ensure confidentiality required by legal ethics rules and client confidentiality agreements

homepage.title: Share Secrets Securely | Onetime Secret
homepage.description: Share sensitive information securely with self-destructing links. Paste your secret, generate a link, and share it. Once viewed, it's gone forever

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Share your information once, then it's permanently deleted

step1.title: Create a Secret
step1.description: Enter your sensitive information and generate a secure one-time link

step2.title: Share the Link
step2.description: Send the secure link through any messaging platform

step3.title: Works only Once
step3.description: Recipient views the secret, then it's permanently deleted

visualExamples.title: Custom Domain & Branding
visualExamples.subtitle: Reinforce your brand and build trust by using your own domain and logo.

featureHighlights.sectionSubtitle: Discover what makes Onetime Secret the preferred solution for secure information sharing.

security.title: Enhanced Privacy Options
security.description: Add a passphrase for an extra layer of security. Only those with the passphrase can view the secret.

selfDestruction.title: Self-Destructing Links
selfDestruction.description: Once viewed or expired, your secret is permanently deleted from our servers. No copies, no traces.

dataResidency.title: Regional Data Storage
dataResidency.description: Choose where your data is stored to meet compliance requirements and data sovereignty needs.

compliance.title: Compliance Ready
compliance.description: Designed to help meet SOC2, GDPR, CCPA & HIPAA requirements for secure information handling.
